A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Lmao.. I think peeps are being way too harsh but hey we have our own opinions.. Spoilers below: I like that they broke the Skywalker lineage and that Rey is normal.. it negates the whole chosen one theme.. it also showed that Rey’s connection to Kylo isn’t blood but via the force.. she’s his light side equal.. I also figured Leia knew that was a force projection of Luke and wasn’t really him which is why she responded the way she did.. he did say he came to the island to die and had shut himself off from the force until yoda forced him to be mindful of his lessons. I also understand why people have issues with the story but really felt they needed to go a different way.. I know Hamill prob wanted more but it was time for him to move on. Can’t continue to grow the story around him.. This is Rey’s story not his so it makes sense that there will beginning (TWA) middle (TLJ) and end (episode 9)
